hesml.taxonomy.impl

Class TaxonomyFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • hesml.taxonomy.impl.TaxonomyFactory

  • public class TaxonomyFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements a set of functions to create an in-memory taxonomy from scratch or from some testing file, as well as other functions to save taxonomy information into a CSV file.
    Author:
    Juan Lastra-DÃ­az

      static ITaxonomy createBlankTaxonomy()
      This function creates a blank taxonomy.
      static ITaxonomy createBlankTaxonomy(int expectedVertexCount)
      This function creates a blank taxonomy with pre-reserved memory for an expected number of vertexes in order to warrant that at least this number of vertexes could be loaded.
      static ITaxonomy loadFromHESMLfile(java.lang.String strFileTaxonomy)
      This function loads a taxonomy from HESML taxonomy file.
      static void saveEdgesInfoToCSV(ITaxonomy taxonomy, java.lang.String strfilename)
      This function saves the edge-based information into an Excel (*.csv)file
      static void saveVertexesInfoToCSV(ITaxonomy taxonomy, java.lang.String strfilename, boolean includeProb)
      This function saves the vertexes info into an Excel (*.csv) file.

        A blank taxonomy

      • createBlankTaxonomy

        public static ITaxonomy createBlankTaxonomy(int expectedVertexCount)
        This function creates a blank taxonomy with pre-reserved memory for an expected number of vertexes in order to warrant that at least this number of vertexes could be loaded.
        Parameters:
        expectedVertexCount - Initial capacity of the taxonomy.
        Returns:
        A blank taxonomy
